name: Magnet Town
description: The theme  for the jam was - 'if you don't hear it, it doesn't exist.'  There is no music for the game, so the idea is to tap the objects to hear if they buzz.  If they do - then tap the magnet to score points for catching the bugs.  If  the bugs get away then you lose a life.  The development only took 3 hours which is why there are quite a few bugs here and there, but I hope this game concept can be extended into to something better in the future
